::Grimmler::

Grimmler begins to walk toward the Cybertronian Fire, helping 
Necromancer along. "It'll be fine. THe CRs are functioning, so we'll 
all live. We can fix it later."

He glances at Necromancer. "Jeez, who did you fight?"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Necromancer extends an arm accepting the help thats been offered. 
On the way
> he sees the damage done to the ship he'd been trying to 
protect, "How bad is
> it?" the tall bot asks, ashamed that the gestault had gotten the 
better of
> him.
